description:
Figure out what this writing means." That`s what the poster on the request board said. But the instant someone read the ancient writing, Natsu, Lucy, and Happy switched minds with Loke, Gray, and Erza! And not only that, if this ancient spell isn`t lifted within 30 minutes, they`ll be stuck like that forever! Caught in a jam no one could have predicted, the guild is in more of an uproar than usual! What`s going to happen to everyone?!
Source: crunchyroll
